title: Tech Week 2025
summary: Join us for Tech Week 2025 - one of the largest tech conferences featuring top companies and leaders shaping the future of tech. Host your event alongside industry giants in San Francisco, Los Angeles, or New York City.
descriptionMd:
## Tech Week 2025

Tech Week 2025 is one of the largest tech conferences, bringing together the brightest minds, innovative startups, and established tech giants for a week of learning, networking, and collaboration.

### Event Overview

Tech Week is a decentralized conference model where companies and organizations host their own events throughout the week, creating a vibrant ecosystem of tech activities across multiple cities.

### Locations

**Primary Cities:**
- **San Francisco** - The heart of Silicon Valley
- **Los Angeles** - Growing tech hub on the West Coast
- **New York City** - East Coast tech and finance center

### How It Works

1. **Host Your Own Event**: Companies and organizations can submit proposals to host events during Tech Week
2. **Featured on Master Calendar**: Approved events are featured on the official Tech Week calendar
3. **Join the Ecosystem**: Connect with other hosts and attendees across hundreds of events

### Event Types

Tech Week features a diverse range of event formats:
- Breakfast, Brunch & Lunch gatherings
- Dinner events
- Experiential activities
- Hackathons
- Happy hours
- Matchmaking & speed networking
- Panel discussions & fireside chats
- Pitch events & demo days
- Workshops & roundtables

### Themes & Topics

Events cover cutting-edge topics including:
- Artificial Intelligence & Machine Learning
- Startups & Entrepreneurship
- Venture Capital & Funding
- Web3 & Blockchain
- Developer Tools & Infrastructure
- Product Development
- Marketing & Growth
- Future of Work

### Important Dates

- **Submission Deadline (SF/LA)**: Friday, August 22, 2025 at 5:00 PM PT
- **Event Week**: October 6-10, 2025 (dates may vary by city)

### Sponsorship

Tech Week is supported by:
- **Platinum Sponsors**: Industry-leading companies
- **Gold Sponsors**: Major tech organizations

### Hosting Requirements

- Events should be in accessible neighborhoods:
  - **SF**: SOMA/Mission area preferred
  - **LA**: Westside (Santa Monica area) preferred
  - **NYC**: SoHo area preferred
- Must include Tech Week logo on event pages
- Provide Partiful registration link
- Agree to Tech Week community guidelines

### Get Involved

**Host an Event**: Submit your proposal at [tech-week.com/host](https://www.tech-week.com/host)

**Attend Events**: Browse the full calendar of events across all cities (coming soon)

**Questions?**: Contact hello@tech-week.com

### Community Guidelines

All events and participants must adhere to Tech Week's community guidelines and privacy policy. By participating, you agree that events are independently organized and Tech Week organizers (including a16z and affiliated entities) are not liable for individual events.

---

*Join thousands of tech professionals, founders, investors, and innovators for an unforgettable week of connection and innovation at Tech Week 2025!*
